item.title: 我的第一篇文章
item.author: jack842248@gmail.com (JackHuang)
item.description: 文章崁入圖片範例: Sphere Triangle 撰寫數學文章範例: $$ \phi = \frac{(1+\sqrt{5})}{2} = 1.6180339887\cdots $$ 撰寫程式語法範例: var num1, num2, sum num1 = prompt("Enter first number") num2 = prompt("Enter second number") sum = parseInt(num1) + parseInt(num2) // "+" means "add" alert("Sum = " + sum) // "+" means combine into a string 撰寫markdown表格範例: Number Next number Previous number Five Six Four Ten Eleven Nine Seven Eight Six Two Three One
